      • init

        public int init(int[] gpio)
        This method initial device for GPIO . The device must be open to read data from it.
        Specified by:
        init in interface Gpio
        Parameters:
        gpio - The direction of GPIO ports.
        Returns:
        Return FT4222_STATUS, FT4222_OK(0) mean success.

      • read

        public int read(int portNum,
       boolean[] bValue)
        This method reads data from the device. The device must be open to read data from it.
        Specified by:
        read in interface Gpio
        Parameters:
        portNum - The number of read port for intput.
        bValue - The data bit for receive.
        Returns:
        Return FTStatus.

      • write

        public int write(int portNum,
        boolean bValue)
        This method writes data to the device. The device must be open to write data to it.
        Specified by:
        write in interface Gpio
        Parameters:
        portNum - The number of write port for output.
        bValue - The data bit for output.
        Returns:
        Return FTStatus.
